title: Req-res-logger â€“ logger for express apps
author: avoronkin
content: readme.md var express = require('express')var rrlogger = require('req-res-logger');var app = express()app.(rrlogger(function(req, res) { res.__start = process.hrtime() }, function (err, req, res) { var end = process.hrtime(req.__start) var responsetime = (end[0]*1e9 + end[1])/1e6 console.log('response ', responsetime) }))var express = require('express')var rrlogger = require('req-res-logger');var app = express()app.(rrlogger(function (err, req, res) { console.log('response status', res.statuscode)}))
